page.title: 16ROLLS FARM- continued
page.content: Mr. Padfield, the owner of ROLLS FARM has taken every opportunity to benefit from developments in agricultural science & associated technology. Precision farming & environmental control might well describe his approach. Extensive field drainage has been undertaken to lower the winter water table, thus providing more suitable early growth conditions for crops in that season.This is balanced by use of high pressure irrigation aerial jet when natural water is insufficient. Rainfall cannot be controlled but to some extent land water can and soil temperature and aeration factors are also influenced. Rate & type of growth are vital parts of precision arable farming & the need to make the most of marketing opportunities within E.E.C. regulations.
